name: Foreboding Fault
description:
Foreboding Fault take you into a strategy puzzle game where with the luck of the roll, and a planned out path, you can rack up points and dread the moment where you inevitable will fall.

Tips:
After a Platform has been jumped off of twice it will fall away and no longer be useable.

Traveling in the same direction increased your combo scores, with a lucky dice streak these combos will make or break your score.

Be wary of high value rolls, they can help you jump gaps, but can just as easily lead you off the ledge.
